step.datasource:
SELECT 630 as Type , 1 as syscreator , ci.cmp_wwn as CustomerID , ok.del_debtor_name as FreeTextfield_13 , ok.del_contactperson as FreeTextfield_14 , ok.del_AddressLine1 as FreeTextField_07 , ok.del_PostCode as FreeTextField_08 , ok.del_City as FreeTextField_12 , ok.ordernr as FreeTextField_09 , 'Montage ' + ok.del_debtor_name + ' / '+ ok.del_city + ' / Order' + ok.ordernr as Description , 1 as FreeBoolField_01 , 10 as SecurityLevel , cast(cast(ok.afldat as datetime) + cast('09:00' as datetime) as datetime) as StartDate , cast(cast(ok.afldat as datetime) + cast('17:00' as datetime) as datetime) as EndDate , 'Products order: ' + ok.ordernr as FreeTextField_04 , 0 as FreeBoolField_02 , 0 as FreeBoolField_04
FROM dbo.orkrg ok WITH (nolock) INNER JOIN orlaco.dbo.cicmpy ci WITH (nolock) ON ok.debnr = ci.debnr
WHERE (ok.selcode = '28') and (ok.afgehandld = 0) AND (ok.refer1 IS NULL) and NOT EXISTS (SELECT FreeTextField_09 FROM [orlaco].dbo.absences A WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE A.Type = 630 AND A.FreeTextField_09 = ok.ordernr ) and (ok.ord_soort <>'Q')
step.stepname: Maak verzoek VIS: Montageopdracht Products aan bij nieuwe montageorder

step.datasource: select top 100 percent min(cast(ab.HID as varchar(50))) as refer1 , ok.ordernr , ok.ordernr as headerid from [orlaco].dbo.absences ab with (nolock) inner join dbo.orkrg ok with (nolock) on ab.freetextfield_09 = ok.ordernr where ok.refer1 is NULL and ok.afgehandld = 0 and ab.type = 630 group by ok.ordernr order by ok.ordernr

select top 100 percent os.id, t.ordernr as headerid from ( select top 100 percent min(cast(ab.HID as varchar(50))) as refer1 , ok.ordernr , ok.ordernr as headerid from [orlaco].dbo.absences ab with (nolock) inner join dbo.orkrg ok with (nolock) on ab.freetextfield_09 = ok.ordernr where ok.refer1 is NULL and ok.afgehandld = 0 and ab.type = 630 group by ok.ordernr order by ok.ordernr ) t inner join dbo.orsrg os with (nolock) on os.ordernr = t.ordernr where os.ar_soort = 'P' order by t.ordernr
